attributes.action: Stop the closure of Uplands Day Nursery
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Holly Lodge school propose to close the above nursery (which has been open for 15 years)on purely financial grounds with no consideration for the education and welfare of the 45 children and its staff. We urge anyone who believes that a childs education should not come at a cost, to please sign the petition.
